plugins.name: VPN Blocker
plugins.description: Query VPN detection services to auto-kick players on VPNs
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Score Restorer
plugins.description: Restores a player's score whenever they rejoin within a set amount of time
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: All Hands On Deck
plugins.description: The All Hands On Deck game mode
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Safe Genocide
plugins.description: A Genocide-like flag without the mass killing
plugins.author: allejo

name: Miscellaneous
description: Plugins that don't really fit into another category

plugins.name: Mapped Death Zones
plugins.description: Introduces basic spawning logic based on where a player died
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: AOLer
plugins.description: Translation plugin that will convert regular chat to AOL 1337 speak
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Auto Team Balance
plugins.description: Switches players to another team during gameplay without the need for a respawn or rejoin. Also allows for auto team balancing
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Capture Bonus
plugins.description: Awards a static bonus to players who capture the flag
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: CTF Overseer
plugins.description: Oversees the fairness and features of CTF
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Demilitarized Zones
plugins.description: Adds zones to maps where shots are rendered harmless
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Flag Reset On Cap
plugins.description: Resets all the flags on the map when a flag is captured except for the team flags
plugins.author: allejo
